value.name: DA Rules Fatal Shooting Of Reymar Gagarin By Modesto Police Was Justified
value.description: DA Rules Fatal Shooting Of Reymar Gagarin By Modesto Police Was Justified May 6, 2021, 7:29 PM An officer-involved shooting that occurred in Modesto last May has been deemed as justified by the county district attorney.
